text: Anjir Liton (Bengali: আনজীর লিটন) is a Bangladeshi rhymester, poet and Children's Writer. He won Bangla Academy Literary Award for His Children's Writings. He is the Director-General of Bangladesh Shishu Academy. == Other websites == *Bangla Academy == References == Category:Living people Category:Bangladeshi poets Category:Bangla Academy Literary Award winners Category:1965 births
title: Anjir Liton
